DOC.brief_summary: Controversy exist regard optimal management acute traumatic cervical spinal cord injury ( SCI ) , especially without bone injury . Although surgical decompression often perform SCI patient cervical canal stenosis , efficacy timing surgery continue subject intense debate . In randomized controlled trial , investigator compare two strategy : early surgery within 24 hour admission delay surgery follow least 2 week conservative treatment . The purpose study examine whether early surgery would result great improvement motor function compare delay surgery .
